effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Sever your bond at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,313, further increased by 870 while you remain within its light.

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 2 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!
